translation.en: [narrator] A young wolf, Cedar, has been scouring the coast for days.
translation.ko: 젊은 늑대 시더가 해안을 며칠째 수색 중입니다

translation.en: Looking for food.
Leftovers.
Anything.
Keep your eye on the scavengers.
They can lead you to food.
A carcass on a small island.
It's 400 yards from shore.
Beyond the reach of most wolves.
translation.ko: 보통의 늑대가 헤엄쳐 가기에는 너무 멉니다

translation.en: But Cedar is not an ordinary wolf.
She's a sea wolf.
Unique to the North Pacific.
Most other wolves would never risk swimming this far in an ocean,
translation.ko: 빙점을 웃도는 바다를 이만큼 멀리 수영하다니

translation.en: barely above freezing.
Cedar lives an extraordinary life…
in an extraordinary land.
Her home is a vast outpost of volcanic rock,
translation.ko: 바다로 뻗은 화산암 평원이 녀석의 집으로

translation.en: creating a giant island filled with wonders.
Surrounded by the North Pacific.
A cold but vibrant ocean…
…that batters its shores,
-yet feeds life across its lands. -[chick chirps]
Where young bears -learn the ways of the forest. -[cub growls]
And how to hunt its pristine rivers.
Bald eagles rule the skies…
…but dine on the sea.
While endangered marmots… …hide out in their mountain fortresses…
translation.ko: 멸종 위기종 마멋은 산속 요새에 숨고…

translation.en: sea otters float on the waves…
-[grunting] -…and fight to survive the ocean extremes.
The shore lines between are patrolled by sea wolves,
translation.ko: 그 사이에 있는 해안은 바다 늑대들이 정찰하는 곳으로

translation.en: whose spirit is legend.
Each year, families here are in a race to raise the next generation…
translation.ko: 매년 이곳의 여러 가족은 다음 세대를 기르느라 바쁩니다

translation.en: before winter sets in.
This is life on the edge.
It's life on Vancouver Island.
Almost 300 miles from top to bottom,
it's the largest island on the west coast of North America.
And spring has just come knocking.
This should be a sweet time for Cedar.
Her pack coming together in the warming weather
translation.ko: 따뜻한 날씨 아래 무리가 함께 모여

translation.en: to hunt the coastline.
Instead, she finds herself shunned by them.
Unable to share in their spoils.
translation.ko: 사냥감을 함께 먹을 수 없게 됐죠

translation.en: Forced to swim offshore
to reach a washed-up seal carcass.
Her first meal in days.
And a badly needed one.
Because Cedar… is pregnant.
And that's a serious problem.
Because the pack's alpha female, Dagger, is pregnant too.
translation.ko: 무리의 우두머리 암컷인 대거 역시 임신했기 때문이죠

translation.en: The alpha male, Jasper, will be father to both their litters.
translation.ko: 우두머리 수컷 재스퍼가 두 배 새끼 모두의 아비입니다

translation.en: Cedar is trapped in a dangerous love triangle.
Now a rival to Dagger and ostracized by the pack,
it'll be a battle to find food for her growing pups.
translation.ko: 자라나는 새끼들을 위해 먹이를 구하려면 분투해야 합니다

translation.en: Bald eagles are the island's undisputed masters of aerial fishing.
translation.ko: 대머리독수리는 이 섬에서 공중 낚시로 비할 데 없는 대가죠

translation.en: Except for Spiro, who is underperforming today.
He and his lifelong partner, Misty, are having some problems back at the nest.
translation.ko: 스피로와 평생을 함께하는 짝인 미스티와 사이가 좋지 않습니다

translation.en: For bald eagles, good fishing and a happy partner go hand in hand.
translation.ko: 대머리독수리의 낚시 실력과 배우자의 행복은 비례합니다

translation.en: If they're to raise nice strong chicks this year,
translation.ko: 올해 낳을 아이들을 튼튼하게 잘 기르려면

translation.en: he'll need to bring home a lot of food.
translation.ko: 수컷이 먹을 것을 많이 사냥해야 하거든요

translation.en: So the last thing Spiro needs
is another pair of hungry eagles muscling in on his turf.
translation.ko: 굶주린 독수리 부부가 나타나 영역 침범을 하면 거슬리겠죠

translation.en: A lousy fisherman, maybe, but a pretty good scrapper.
translation.ko: 낚시 실력은 별로여도 싸우는 실력은 쓸 만하군요

translation.en: Misty doesn't want a fighter though.
translation.ko: 그러나 미스티가 원하는 건 싸움꾼이 아닙니다

translation.en: She wants food.
She expects him to prove himself each year before they mate,
translation.ko: 매년 짝짓기 전이면 남편의 실력을 보고 싶어 합니다

translation.en: by bringing her tasty gifts
translation.ko: 가장 역할을 얼마나 잘할 수 있는지

translation.en: to show how well he could provide for his family.
Misty is not impressed.
No luck fishing? There are other options.
translation.ko: 낚시에 운이 안 따라준다면 다른 방법도 있습니다

translation.en: Uh… Never order the crab.
This year's wooing is off to a terrible start.
Misty wants results.
Every spring,
the island's flourishing waters draw in distant travelers.
translation.ko: 이 섬의 비옥한 바다가 먼 곳에서 손님들을 부릅니다

translation.en: From all across the Pacific,
millions of creatures travel north along the coast.
Some migrating thousands of miles.
It's one of the greatest mass movements of life on the planet.
And when they get here, this place is going to get wild.
But, for now, the island sea is a peaceful haven
translation.ko: 그때까지 이 섬 주변 바다는 평화로운 피난처입니다

translation.en: for a proud sea otter mom, Skye, and her son, Rocky,
translation.ko: 자랑스러운 아들 로키를 낳은 해달 어미 스카이에게는 그렇죠

translation.en: one of the first pups of spring.
translation.ko: 올해 봄 태어난 첫 새끼 중 한 마리입니다

translation.en: Their floating pool chair vibe is a central part of their lives.
translation.ko: 튜브를 낀 듯 편안한 분위기가 이들 삶의 중심입니다

translation.en: But in truth, their lives are hanging by a thread.
translation.ko: 하지만 사실 이들은 지금도 생사를 넘나들고 있죠

translation.en: Just to keep warm and produce enough milk for Rocky,
translation.ko: 체온을 유지하고 로키에게 먹일 모유를 만들기 위해

translation.en: Skye must eat at least 15 pounds of seafood every day.
translation.ko: 스카이는 매일 최소 7kg의 해산물을 먹어야 합니다

translation.en: Right beneath her, there's a huge, rich, delicious kelp forest teeming with life.
translation.ko: 바로 아래에는 거대하고 풍성하며 맛 좋은 해초 숲이 넘실대고 있죠

translation.en: But heading down to the buffet
means leaving Rocky floating on the surface…
…alone.
Sea otters are the only marine mammals that don't have blubber to keep them warm.
translation.ko: 해달은 해양 포유류 중 유일하게 체온을 유지할 지방층이 없습니다

translation.en: So each time Skye dives down, the clock is ticking.
Rocky's body heat is dropping fast.
She should be eating about 100 clams a day,
translation.ko: 어미는 원래 하루에 조개를 100개는 먹어야 합니다

translation.en: which could take hours.
Little Rocky doesn't have hours.
translation.ko: 그러나 로키를 그렇게 오래 혼자 둘 수 없습니다

translation.en: It's a delicate balancing act for Skye
to keep them both alive.
translation.ko: 두 마리 모두 살아남을 수 있습니다

translation.en: Around three-quarters of Vancouver Island is covered in thick rainforest.
Here on the west coast,
there are still areas of old-growth forest that have never been logged.
translation.ko: 한 번도 벌목된 적 없는 오래된 숲이 남아 있기도 하죠

translation.en: Some of the oldest trees can soar to over 300 feet tall
translation.ko: 제일 오래된 나무 중에는 90m 넘게 자란 것도 있습니다

translation.en: in these perfect growing conditions.
The annual 20 feet of rainfall
makes it ideal for all moisture-loving creatures.
Everywhere is damp.
But Dagger is searching for somewhere dry.
translation.ko: 그러나 대거는 마른 땅을 찾고 있군요

translation.en: The pack's traditional birthing den is a long-held sanctuary…
translation.ko: 옛날부터 새끼를 낳는 굴은 무리 사이에 정해져 있습니다

translation.en: under the roots of this giant tree, always reserved for the alpha female.
translation.ko: 이 거대한 나무 아래로 우두머리 암컷 전용이죠

translation.en: It's been nine months since Dagger was last here,
translation.ko: 대거가 마지막으로 여기 온 것도 9개월 전입니다

translation.en: so she's making sure everything's in order.
Cedar isn't so lucky.
As a low-ranking young mother, she's not a priority for the den.
translation.ko: 계급 낮은 어린 어미다 보니 굴에 들어갈 우선권이 없죠

translation.en: She has to fight for everything she gets.
But an intense low-pressure system is building offshore.
translation.ko: 그러나 바다에서는 강한 저기압이 형성 중입니다

translation.en: So, her luck might change.
Misty takes cover,
while Spiro tries to keep fishing.
In recent years, storms have become more intense.
translation.ko: 최근 몇 년간 폭풍우가 갈수록 거세졌습니다

translation.en: The sea wolves know if it's bad enough,
the ocean might even do their hunting for them,
translation.ko: 폭풍이 많이 거칠면 해달이 해안으로 밀려와

translation.en: by forcing a sea otter ashore.
Rocky needs full-on lifeguarding right now.
It's impossible to stay warm in this.
Even the adults are seeking shelter ashore.
Skye needs to do the same if she's going to save Rocky.
They're safe.
Finally, Skye is able to feed him some nice, warm milk.
translation.ko: 드디어 스카이가 아들에게 따뜻한 모유를 먹입니다

translation.en: She's so exhausted, she falls asleep almost instantly.
After the storm comes the calm.
Cedar is up bright and early,
seeing if the storm has left her any offerings.
translation.ko: 혹시 폭풍이 남기고 간 먹잇감은 없나 찾습니다

translation.en: She smells fresh meat on the wind.
translation.ko: 바람이 신선한 고기 향을 싣고 옵니다

translation.en: Overnight, a wolf killed a sea otter.
translation.ko: 밤새 늑대 한 마리가 해달을 사냥했군요

translation.en: But she's not the only one who's picked up the scent.
translation.ko: 그러나 냄새를 맡은 늑대가 이외에도 있는 모양입니다

translation.en: Jasper, the alpha, has come to claim it.
translation.ko: 우두머리 수컷인 재스퍼가 먹이를 차지하러 옵니다

translation.en: Robbing Cedar to feed Dagger.
translation.ko: 시더의 것을 빼앗아 대거에게 줄 작정이군요

translation.en: This is all Cedar's getting.
By dragging the carcass into the forest,
Jasper is partaking in the island's great exchange.
translation.ko: 재스퍼는 섬의 커다란 순환에 이바지하고 있습니다

translation.en: Every year,
predators carry hundreds of thousands of tons of rich marine life
translation.ko: 영양이 풍부한 해안 생물을 수십만 톤씩

translation.en: from the ocean inland.
When the carcasses break down,
they transfer nutrients from the sea to the soil.
This massive nutrition infusion helps the first spring flowers to bloom,
translation.ko: 이 대량 영양 공급 덕분에 봄에 첫 꽃이 피어나고

translation.en: and the trees to grow tall.
One way or another,
the ocean nurtures all life on this island.
translation.ko: 이 섬의 모든 생명에 영양을 공급합니다

translation.en: Now that conditions have settled back down,
the fish have moved closer to the surface.
An excellent time to go gift shopping.
Spiro is desperate to impress Misty.
translation.ko: 스피로가 미스티에게 좋은 인상을 주려 안달입니다

translation.en: She likes it.
She really likes it.
Spiro is officially impressive.
translation.ko: 스피로가 좋은 이미지 주기에 드디어 성공했습니다

translation.en: Now the pressure is on.
Misty will be ready to lay in about ten days.
And to make healthy eggs, she'll need a healthy diet.
Spiro gets straight back to work.
Skye is now feeding Rocky his first solid food,
and he's getting big, fast.
Enough so, that he can now bob around for hours without her help.
translation.ko: 이제 엄마 도움 없이도 몇 시간 떠다닐 수 있습니다

translation.en: Which gives Skye more time to dive for their favorite cuisine.
translation.ko: 덕분에 스카이는 좋아하는 먹이를 사냥하러 더 오래 잠수합니다

translation.en: Clams.
She now needs to eat half her body weight each day…
translation.ko: 이제 매일 몸무게의 절반 무게를 먹어야만 합니다

translation.en: to feed herself and Rocky.
But some uninvited guests just crashed the clam party.
translation.ko: 갑자기 불청객이 조개 파티에 훼방을 놓습니다

translation.en: Gray whales.
The first visitors of spring.
At the beginning of March, they stop by
en route from their birthing grounds in Mexico,
to their summer feeding in Alaska.
They stir up the mud in the shallows
and sift out huge mouthfuls of crustaceans and shrimp.
translation.ko: 커다란 입으로 갑각류와 새우를 걸러내 먹습니다

translation.en: They've taken over Skye's clam beds.
And what's she going to do about it? Chase them off?
She has to find some other feeding spot.
This small cove is safe from the whales.
translation.ko: 이 작은 만에서는 고래를 만나지 않겠군요

translation.en: It's only got barnacles though.
And they're a lot more work to crack open.
But you've got to get your protein where you can.
Rocky wants to tag along on his mom's hunting dives.
translation.ko: 로키도 엄마의 잠수 사냥에 동참하고 싶어 합니다

translation.en: It's just that his coat is so thick and buoyant on his little body,
translation.ko: 그러나 작은 몸에 자란 털이 너무 두껍고 물에 잘 뜨는 탓에

translation.en: he can't stay under.
He's the otter equivalent of a toddler, so, yeah, not that coordinated.
translation.ko: 사람으로 치자면 유아기라 아직 손발을 잘 못 다룹니다

translation.en: When grey whales are in town, there's always trouble.
When they get between otter moms and pups, they can separate them.
translation.ko: 해달 어미와 새끼 사이에 끼면 가족이 생이별할 수 있습니다

translation.en: Their wake could pull a drifting baby far out to sea.
translation.ko: 고래가 일으킨 파도에 새끼가 먼바다로 떠밀리기도 하죠

translation.en: Skye can't see Rocky…
…so she homes in on his cries.
Mom hands him some nice, hard barnacle candy
translation.ko: 어미가 예쁘고 단단한 따개비 사탕을 쥐여주자

translation.en: and he's a happy pup again.
translation.ko: 로키는 한 마리 행복한 새끼가 됩니다

translation.en: The whales bring a lot of drama,
but in the long run,
these giants actually help the otters and other animals.
translation.ko: 이 거인들만큼 해달과 여러 동물을 돕는 것도 없죠

translation.en: The nutrients they stir up in the silt will fertilize the local kelp forest…
translation.ko: 이들이 뒤집은 흙에서 나온 영양분으로 해초 숲이 자라고

translation.en: ultimately making more seafood for everyone.
translation.ko: 결국 모두가 먹을 해산물이 늘어나는 셈이죠

translation.en: Tensions are starting to mount on the island.
The residents are expecting a huge annual feast to arrive.
translation.ko: 주민들이 매년 열리는 거대한 축제를 기다리는데

translation.en: But it's two weeks late… and still no sign.
Without it, the island's breeding season could be a disaster.
translation.ko: 축제가 열리지 않으면 올해 번식기는 큰일인데요

translation.en: But then…
it begins.
Pacific herring arrive in their millions to spawn in these shallow bays,
translation.ko: 수백만 마리 태평양청어가 얕은 만에 알을 낳으러 온 겁니다

translation.en: where their eggs will be protected from the ocean surf.
Each female can lay 20,000 eggs,
translation.ko: 암컷 한 마리가 알을 2만 개까지 낳습니다

translation.en: attaching them to seaweed and eelgrass, one egg at a time.
translation.ko: 알 하나하나를 거머리말 해초에 붙여 가면서요

translation.en: Their spawning colors the coastline for miles.
translation.ko: 이 산란기면 수 킬로미터씩 해안 색이 변합니다

translation.en: For the thousands of waiting sea lions, dinner is finally served.
translation.ko: 목 빼고 기다리던 수천 마리 바다사자들에겐 거한 한 상이죠

translation.en: This event is absolutely life-sustaining for the island…
translation.ko: 이 섬의 생명들에게 없어서는 안 될 사건이지만

translation.en: yet lasts only a few days.
The sea lions charge the herring from below…
driving them up to where the eagles can snatch them at the surface.
translation.ko: 그렇게 올라온 청어를 독수리들이 수면에서 잡죠

translation.en: Spiro is so stuffed, he can barely lift off from the shore.
translation.ko: 스피로는 배가 얼마나 불렀는지 날기도 힘들 지경입니다

translation.en: But Misty's eggs will surely be healthy now.
translation.ko: 그래도 미스티의 알은 이제 건강히 태어나겠죠

translation.en: Most of the sea lions have swallowed over 50 pounds of herring.
And this is only the first day of herring fest.
There's always that guy who had too much at the party.
In the quiet aftermath, a different kind of visitor comes calling.
translation.ko: 폭풍 후의 조용한 고요 속에 다른 손님들이 등장합니다

translation.en: A family of killer whales.
The ocean's top predator.
And they're not here for the herring.
They specialize in hunting sea lions.
Nice, big, bloated, overfed, sleepy ones.
translation.ko: 배가 빵빵하게 불러 꾸벅꾸벅 조는 녀석들요

translation.en: The wise matriarch of the pod is 67 years old.
translation.ko: 이 무리의 현명한 우두머리 암컷은 67살이나 됐습니다

translation.en: The largest is a 30-foot male with a dorsal fin a full six feet tall.
Today, instead of using their stealth, the killer whales announce their arrival.
translation.ko: 오늘은 조용히 접근하는 대신 요란하게 등장하는군요

translation.en: Sending the entire colony of sea lions into a very convenient panic.
translation.ko: 덕분에 바다사자 무리가 당황해 사냥이 용이하겠습니다

translation.en: They instinctively flee into the water…
…where they feel safer and move faster.
translation.ko: 더 안전하다고 느껴지기도 하고 빨리 움직일 수 있으니까요

translation.en: Exactly what the orcas wanted.
The sea lions are wary though and don't stray too far from shore.
translation.ko: 그러나 바다사자들이 겁을 먹어 해안에서 멀리 나오지 않습니다

translation.en: Then the matriarch leads her pod away from the colony.
translation.ko: 그때 우두머리 암컷이 무리를 다른 곳으로 이끕니다

translation.en: She's spotted something more promising.
A sea lion returning late from the herring hunt, alone,
translation.ko: 청어 사냥에서 홀로 늦게 돌아오는 바다사자입니다

translation.en: out in the open water.
Sea lions are fast,
but this one is surrounded, battered…
translation.ko: 이 녀석은 범고래에게 둘러싸여 얻어맞고 있습니다

translation.en: …and stunned by its attackers.
Killer whales are known to share their kills among the group.
translation.ko: 범고래는 먹이를 잡으면 나눠 먹기로 유명합니다

translation.en: And by harassing and killing off sea lions,
these top predators actually protect the herring populations,
translation.ko: 이 최상위 포식자들은 청어 개체 수를 보호 중입니다

translation.en: striking a balance that helps to keep the island healthy.
translation.ko: 이 섬을 건강하게 유지할 균형을 맞추는 일이죠

translation.en: After a few days,
the great shoals of herring leave the island
and head back into the deep…
leaving behind the next generation.
The eggs attach to everything.
The beach becomes a jewel-studded veil of new life…
translation.ko: 해안이 새로운 생명이라는 보석 박힌 베일로 변모합니다

translation.en: up to half a million eggs per square foot.
The herring have left,
but there's more fare for the locals than ever.
translation.ko: 섬 주민들이 먹을 것은 그 어느 때보다도 풍족합니다

translation.en: This once-a-year feast
even attracts creatures from deep in the forest…
…the island's biggest land predator, a male black bear.
translation.ko: 이 섬의 최대 육지 포식자인 수컷 흑곰입니다

translation.en: Brutus just woke up from five months of hibernation.
translation.ko: 브루투스는 5개월의 동면 끝에 지금 막 일어났습니다

translation.en: And he would kill for something nice and juicy to fill up on.
translation.ko: 촉촉하고 맛있는 먹이를 위해서는 못 할 일이 없을 겁니다

translation.en: Gobs of protein-rich herring eggs are the perfect appetizer.
translation.ko: 단백질 풍부한 청어알 한가득이면 전채로 완벽하겠군요

translation.en: The king of the forest's first meal of the year…
translation.ko: 이 숲을 호령하는 왕이 올해 누리는 첫 식사는

translation.en: courtesy of the Pacific Ocean.
Its boundless generosity
has powered up the neighborhood residents for a giant baby boom.
translation.ko: 근방 생명체들이 힘을 얻어 많은 자손을 보겠군요

translation.en: The next generation of Vancouver Islanders is on its way.
Spiro and Misty are already getting things rolling.
translation.ko: 스피로와 미스티는 이미 본격적으로 시동을 걸었군요

translation.en: A sneaky raven tries to lure them away from their eggs…
translation.ko: 꾀 많은 까마귀가 부모 독수리를 꾀어내서

translation.en: …so it can grab one.
Nice try, Raven.
One of them needs to be guarding that nest at all times.
translation.ko: 늘 한 마리는 남아 둥지를 지켜야만 합니다

translation.en: So when Misty needs to eat, she has to trust Spiro to hold the fort.
translation.ko: 미스티는 사냥을 나가며 스피로를 믿는 수밖에 없죠

translation.en: And he's up for the challenge.
[in sing-song voice] Misty's going to be so impressed.
[in normal voice] April rolls into May.
And spring washes over the island.
The neighborhood now welcomes new creatures of all stripes.
translation.ko: 온갖 새로운 생물의 탄생을 사방에서 환영하는군요

translation.en: Dagger has spent the last three weeks in her den.
She checks to make sure it's safe…
for newcomers.
-[pups whimpering] -Two tiny pups, from under their special, old tree.
translation.ko: 예로부터 내려오는 이 나무 아래에서 두 마리가 태어났습니다

translation.en: This is their first adventure into the outside world.
They're still so wobbly and vulnerable…
that Dagger has to stay with them day and night.
She doesn't need to leave,
she knows an alpha's food will always be delivered.
Up in the spruce high-rise…
…the happy day has finally arrived.
Thanks to Spiro's hard work and Misty's herring binge,
translation.ko: 스피로가 열심히 일하고 미스티가 청어를 열심히 먹은 덕에

translation.en: their chicks are strong and healthy.
And while she stays at the nest to guard and feed them,
translation.ko: 어미는 둥지에 남아 새끼들을 지키고 먹이지만

translation.en: Spiro's eager to show off his hunting chops again.
translation.ko: 스피로는 사냥 실력을 다시 뽐내고 싶어 안달입니다

translation.en: These mini raptors fight for every bite.
translation.ko: 이 새끼 독수리들은 먹이 하나를 두고도 싸웁니다

translation.en: The competition is fierce. Even at this age.
Usually, only one will survive.
If both chicks are to make it, the ocean must keep giving.
translation.ko: 두 마리 모두 살아남으려면 바다가 먹이를 많이 줘야 하죠

translation.en: But come summer, there will be no guarantees.
translation.ko: 그러나 여름이 되면 그런다는 보장이 없습니다

translation.en: The young loner, Cedar, has now also given birth.
translation.ko: 젊고 혼자인 시더 역시 새끼를 낳았습니다

translation.en: But has to leave her pups so she can eat and supply them with milk.
translation.ko: 그러나 자기 배를 채우고 모유를 주려면 홀로 다녀야 하죠

translation.en: It's a lot harder finding food without a pack to rely on.
translation.ko: 하지만 기댈 무리가 없으니 먹이 찾기가 훨씬 어렵습니다

translation.en: And today, the ocean isn't helping her.
Cedar has to find food somewhere, and soon.
It looks like she's made a decision.
She's heading for Dagger's den.
Wolves have been known to raid a rival's den.
As food becomes ever more scarce,
it's not just Cedar who will be driven to take desperate measures.
translation.ko: 극단적인 선택을 내리는 건 시더만이 아닐 겁니다
